        Returns:

      • getClasspathResourceLocation

        public static java.lang.String getClasspathResourceLocation(java.lang.Class relativeClass,
                                            java.lang.String resourceName)
        Contructs a URL string for a resource in the same package as the given class.
        NOTE: the URL string always contains forward slash ('/') seperators, even on Windows
        Parameters:
        relativeClass - Class in the same packing in the resource is located
        resourceName - Name of the resource
        Returns:
        A URL string to locate the resource
